head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LEWIS, THEODORE N.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LEWIS, THEODORE N.

block.p: LEWIS-Theodore N., Rabbi. The Rabbi, Cantor, Presidents and Trustees, the Congregation of Temple Beth Emeth Progressive Shaari Zedek mourn the passing of their illustrious and beloved Rabbi Emeritus, Theodore N. Lewis, whose leadership and influence spanned a good part of the twentieth century, leaving the legacy of a good and beloved name.

LEWIS-Theodore N., Rabbi. The Rabbi, Cantor, Presidents and Trustees, the Congregation of Temple Beth Emeth Progressive Shaari Zedek mourn the passing of their illustrious and beloved Rabbi Emeritus, Theodore N. Lewis, whose leadership and influence spanned a good part of the twentieth century, leaving the legacy of a good and beloved name.
